body:
# State of the Repo Report, July 2019

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics â enjoy! ð¤

790 (+5) authors have contributed to the project (merged contributions). Thank you! â¤ï¸

The repo contains 490 143 (+2 199) lines of text and 1 761 (+23) files.

20 902 (+290) commits have been made of which 4 020 (+103) are merge commits.

There are currently 277 (-10) open pull requests from in total 84 contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 6 percent.

The total set of open pull requests adds 54 678 lines, removes 20 560 lines and touches 2 172 distinct files.

The "median open pull request" adds 59 lines, removes 18 lines and touches 4 files.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, June 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/16298)
